metadata.dc:author: Lolas, F
Sciolla, A
metadata.dc:description: The Drive and Mood Scale, used in chronopsychometric studies for evaluating dimensions of Affective State, is presented. This instrument is based upon the ESTA Scale developed by Supprian and complemented on the basis of the experience gathered during research projects conducted with the Spanish version.
metadata.dc:title: La escala de ánimo-impulso para la cuantificación del estado afectivo (EA).
[Drive and Mode Scale for the quantification of affective states].
metadata.dc:publisher: Acta psiquiatrica y psicologica de America latina
